archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1151
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As Vodafone, we want a process to cater for customers who join with an incorrect email address, so it can be corrected. Must include: "This wasn't me" link in any email notification we send which flags in CRM the email is wrong, process to correct email address.

properties.value: [CLM] Can be added to all communication from CLM/CCM have to be clarified how to handele it

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
